title: Help in Doubt and Need (4R124)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert an unbound [Gondor] Man to make a [Rohan] companion strength +2, or exert a [Rohan] companion to make an unbound [Gondor] Man strength +2.
Lore:	”'The Heir of Elendil would be a strength indeed to the Sons of Eorl in this evil tide.'”
Rarity:	R
